page.title: 12HEALTH SEASCALE/GOSFORTH
page.content: I went to Casualty Department to have my finger X-Rayed.Then the doctor bandaged my finger using my little finger as a splint.I had to go back the next week for the doctor to check it was alright.In about three months my finger had healed. Most people go to the Clinic when they are ill. There are four Doctors, one of whom is a lady. If the Doctor thinks you need some medicine you go to the counter in the waiting room and the lady Pharmacist gives you what you need.There are several Nurses as well who help the Doctors. There is also a dentist at the Clinic but most people go to have their teeth filled by other Dentists,at Sellafield or Egremont. Sometimes you have to see someone at the Hospital if your teeth are growing crooked.
